long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you may need to finish simple number processing tasks like converting between binary/decimal/hexadecimal numbers, or converting ASCII text to them. This extension can help you get them done easily. 

Just paste what you want to process, and click on start button, then wait for the result to come out. It is fast and effective! 12 handy tools are available for now, which include:

- Dec to Bin: converts decimal number to binary number
- Dec to Hex: converts decimal number to hexadecimal number
- Bin to Dec: converts binary number to decimal number
- Bin to Hex: converts binary number to hexadecimal number
- Hex to Bin: converts hexadecimal number to binary number
- Hex to Dec: converts hexadecimal number to decimal number     

More tools will be added to the extension in a regular basis.
